# Divider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                 | Type                                                                             | Default                  |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ |
| `color`       | `color`       | Basic divider color variations depending on theme property. | `"neutral-contrast-high" \| "neutral-contrast-low" \| "neutral-contrast-medium"` | `'neutral-contrast-low'` |
| `orientation` | `orientation` |                                                             | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`                                                     | `'horizontal'`           |
| `theme`       | `theme`       | Adapts the text color depending on the theme.               | `"dark" \| "light"`                                                              | `'light'`                |
